name: Fall Girl
description:
This game was made for Ludum Dare 51 with a theme "Every 10 Seconds".

Description

Being a window washer is not easy. You’ve balanced on the edge, seen things better left unseen, witnessed friends try and fail to fly. But hey, that’s the job and someone has to do it.

This game was inspired by a joke news article published by The Onion.

Gameplay

You are a window washer. So go wash some windows! When in doubt, jump on things. Try not to fall to your death.

Keybindings
  • Keyboard: AD or Arrow Keys to walk, Space or Arrow Up to jump, E to wash
  • Controller: L Thumb or D-pad to walk, A to jump, B to wash
Credits

Everything made from scratch for the jam by the two of us, except for the music track.

Music: “Psychic City (Voodoo City) (Instrumental)” by Yacht under Attribution-NonCommercial-NoDerivatives 4.0 International (CC BY-NC-ND 4.0) license. Check out Yacht here.
